day: Intersection Closure Scheduled 24 Hrs/Day for Intersection of Euclid Ave at Woodland Ave:
event: The intersection is currently CLOSED for major sanitary sewer work and is scheduled to reopen at 7 a.m. on Monday June 8.

day: Intersection Closure Scheduled 24 Hrs/Day for Intersection of Euclid Ave at Woodland Ave:
event: Detours via E Maxwell St and E High St. Businesses will remain accessible. Please see the complete details.
Scheduled events are either cancelled or postponed until further notice.
Please follow all CDC guidelines as well as city and Kentucky state government directives and recommendations, and limit travel when possible.
